FAQ.a1: Lovics is a next-generation digital vault platform designed for you to securely store your photos, videos, and sensitive digital data. Your data is encrypted and remains completely under your control.
FAQ.a2: Lovics uses zero-knowledge encryption architecture. Thanks to this system, only you can access your data ‚Äî no one, including Lovics, can view your content.
FAQ.a3: No. Lovics is designed in a way that it cannot access user data. Encryption keys belong solely to the user.
FAQ.q4: Can I share my data with others?
FAQ.a4: Control is completely yours. You can keep your content private or securely share it with selected individuals if you wish.
FAQ.q5: What makes Lovics different from other cloud services?
FAQ.a5: Lovics is not just a storage space. Thanks to its privacy-focused architecture, it offers full ownership over your data and makes your digital assets truly yours.
FAQ.q6: Which devices can I access from?
FAQ.a6: You can access Lovics anytime via mobile and web, and securely manage your digital vault from anywhere.
FAQ.q7: Is there a risk of losing my stored data?
FAQ.a7: Your data is protected by advanced security protocols and system continuity is ensured at the highest standards.
FAQ.q8: Why is privacy so important for Lovics?
FAQ.a8: For us, privacy is not a feature, but a fundamental right of the digital world. Lovics was built for a safer internet where users have real control over their data.
